EmailTemplate.name: Work Order Active Transit Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Work Order {!WorkOrder.WorkOrderNumber} is in active transit
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!WorkOrder.Contact}, Thank you for contacting NCR Service Desk, your Work Order is in active transit with the following details: Case Number: {!WorkOrder.Case} Work Order Number: {!WorkOrder.WorkOrderNumber} Serialized Asset: {!WorkOrder.Serialized_Asset_Id__c} S/N: {!WorkOrder.Serial_Number__c} Site Name: {!WorkOrder.Site_Id__c} Store Number / Branch: {!WorkOrder.Store_Branch_No__c} Address: {!WorkOrder.Address} Created Date/Time: {!WorkOrder.CreatedDate} Dispatch Case Status (ES): {!WorkOrder.Dispatch_Case_Status_ES__c} Brief Description: {!WorkOrder.Description} Customer Reference Number: {!WorkOrder.Customer_Ticket_Number__c} Tracking Number: {!WorkOrder.Tracking_Number__c} If you need additional help or to provide support with an update to your case, feel free to contact the Service Desk. Sincerely, NCR Service Desk
